ygData.subject: Re: Kedge Loot
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the serrated blade, which has the same graphic as the sharkjaw, and every time I play I get asked about it or get inspected.  It was cool for a while
ygData.messageBody:
I have the serrated blade, which has the same graphic as the sharkjaw, and
every time I play I get asked about it or get inspected. It was cool for a
while only being a bard still in the teens, but it does get annoying.


----- Original Message -----
From: JasonF <JasonF@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 11:47 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Kedge Loot


> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> If you killed CauldronBoil the shark, one of his drops is the Sharkjaw
> Cutlass (10/32 weight 2.0). It's a very nice weapon with a great curved
and
> serrated look to it that I won a roll for. I get inspected *a lot*
wielding
> this weapon, and I get tells from out of the blue from people saying
> "soandso told me you have a sharkjaw, what're the stats?" When people ask
I
> tell them "10/32 weight 2.0, procs Player Inspections".
>
> Crier
>
> > Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 35 Songs - Veeshan
> >
> > Ps, been residing in Kedge the last few days, exp is great there and
it's
> > good fun. Anyone know what kind of good stuff drops there? Our group
have
> > been as low as the 2nd level and it's damn scary. We killed a Cauldron
> > shark and then a Hammerhead shark spawned in it's place, it was
> > red a level 38 so I am wondering if it's a named mob that drops
something
> good.
>
>
>
